languageTexts.vlcMissingMessage: Please first install VLC and try again
languageTexts.updateInProgress3: The procedure might take a few minutes.
languageTexts.updateInProgress4: When update is completed, please restart the application.
languageTexts.uploadSoundWarning: If no sound is uploaded the default sound will be used.
languageTexts.configureMatrixSize2: leave blank to use the default size
languageTexts.configureWordsExtra: Field 5 can also be configured saperately for each word, during a later step.
languageTexts.userNameErrorMessage: The user name must not be blank
languageTexts.rawsAndColumnsErrorMessage: The raws and columns of the matrix must be integers, between 2 and 6.
languageTexts.selectionButtonErrorMessage: The selection button should not be empty
languageTexts.selectionAndNavigationButtonsErrorMessag: The selection and navigation buttons should not be empty
The selection and navigation buttons should be different
languageTexts.profileNotSavedMessage: The profile was not saved. Please try again.
languageTexts.filesNotFound: Some files could not be found
languageTexts.userDeleteConfirmation: Are you sure that you wish to delete this user?
languageTexts.editText: Click a word to edit it.
languageTexts.additionText: To add a new word press:
languageTexts.communicationTabFilesNotFoundErrorMessag: These files could not be found
languageTexts.configureAvailableImageGroups: Configure the available groups of images
languageTexts.addSoundsForCongratulationsAndMistakes: Add sounds for congratulations and mistakes
languageTexts.addSoundsForCongratulationsAndMistakes2: default sounds will be used if you do not add new ones
languageTexts.selectCategoryText: Select a category in order to configure its games. The available categories are:
languageTexts.selectAvailabilityText: Choose which games will be available to the user by selecting “Available” or “Not Available”, respectively.
languageTexts.selectAvailabilitySaveText: Under the list of games, use the "Save" button to save your choices.
languageTexts.selectDifficultyLevelText: Adjust the difficulty level for every game by selecting the images you wish for each quartet. To select an image, click the button under it.
languageTexts.noGamesInCategory: There are no games in this category
languageTexts.pleaseCreateNewGame: Please create a new game in order to add it
languageTexts.pressTheButtonOnTheSimilar: Press the button on the similar!
languageTexts.errorMusicDirectory: Please choose correctly the music directory.
languageTexts.errorVideoDirectory: Please choose correctly the video directory.
languageTexts.defineAmountOfItemsPerPage: Define the amount of songs and videos per page
languageTexts.errorAmountOfSongs: Please choose the amount of songs correctly.
languageTexts.errorAmountOfSongs2: Please choose the amount of songs between 6 and 10.
languageTexts.wordMustNotBeEmpty: The word must not be empty
languageTexts.wordMustHaveImage: The word must have an image
languageTexts.wordBelongsToSelection: Select where does this word belong to
languageTexts.wordMustBelongToAnotherWord: The word must belong to another word
languageTexts.wordBelongsToSelection2: Select the word that this word belongs to, or select "COMMUNICATION" if this is a new category of words.
languageTexts.wordDeleteConfirmation: Are you sure that you wish to delete the word?
languageTexts.sequenceGameInfo: Place the cards in the right order.
